description: This course covers contracts for the carriage of goods by sea, including charterparties and bills of lading. It considers complex legal issues involving practical commercial problems, international conventions and standard form contracts in use worldwide.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
